description.@en: This will create a near-colorless bomb that obscures vision and more.

effect.@en:
Create Powder Bomb: Depending on where you’re at on the Damage Condition Track, the Difficulty Rating eases or worsens:

Unharmed: (Easy +20%) Alchemy

Hurt: (Routine +10%) Alchemy

Moderately Wounded: (Standard +/-0%) Alchemy

Seriously Wounded: (Challenging -10%) Alchemy

Grievously Wounded: (Hard -20%) Alchemy

Effect: If successful, you create a number of bombs for every 6 points of your [IB]. If failed, nothing happens.

[IB] 1 to 6: One bomb

[IB] 7 to 12: Two bombs

[IB] 13+: Three bombs

reagents.@en: You must have access to an alchemical laboratory, blackpowder and talc. Powder Bombs can be found in Article 5: Wares & Weapons.
